131183.name: Wings of Glory: WW2 Rules and Accessories Pack

boardgamefamily.55: Wings of Glory / Wings of War

125680.name: Isla Pirata
125680.description:
With skill and patience, the pirate ship can reach the most distant islands in search of treasure. Help it to find land!

Objective of the game: To take the little ball in the ship, without it falling, to the highest holes, which score the highest points.

How to play: First assemble the ship and the platform with holes. Place a ball inside the ship and move it up, down and to the sides by pulling on the red balls hanging from each end. There are points for the holes: 10, 30 and 50 points,
and this makes it more fun.

Other ways to play:
By using your imagination, you can create other
ways of playing:
- Compete to get the most points, remembering
the points for each hole - let's see who scores
the most.
- Compete for speed. Without the ball falling out
of the ship, see who can get highest, quickest!

125681.name: Shadows of Moscow
125681.description:
UNPUBLISHED PRODUCT




it appears this Item will never be published
this Item has been moved to (Unpublished Products)
there should be no product images submitted to this entry




From the publisher:

Shadows of Moscow is a Call of Cthulhu adventure set in late 1930's Russia under the iron fisted control of Joseph Stalin. While the great purge known as the Terror happens all around them, several "agents" of the state must investigate a strange murder in the frozen rail yards of Moscow. Originally written for the Cthulhu Masters Tournament, Shadows of Moscow comes supplied with six pre-generated characters for this cruel and mind bending scenario.

125682.description:
Description from the publisher:

Steam Torpedo: First Contact - To Your Positions! is a non-collectible booster pack for the tactical submarine battle game Steam Torpedo that includes seven new submarine compartment tiles and three new crew members, thereby allowing players to build new submarines and create new strategies.
125682.name: Steam Torpedo: First Contact – To Your Positions!

boardgamehonor.22016: 2013 Origins Awards Best Miniatures Rules Nominee

125683.description:
From Privateer Press webpage

Darkness descends upon the nations of the Iron Kingdoms as the undead legions of Cryx overwhelm Point Bourne, revealing their true strength. As war once again consumes the land, the embattled nations race to deploy colossal warjacks bristling with weaponry to turn the tide. But the emergence of new threats, both ancient and unseen, will force old enemies into uneasy cooperation in a fight for survival!

WARMACHINE: Colossals brings you the next thrilling chapter of the WARMACHINE saga. Elevate your game with:
- Powerful new colossals—enormous warjacks that dwarf even the largest heavy ’jacks and bring all-new strategies to the table - on 120mm bases.
- New warcasters for each faction, including the third incarnations of some of the Iron Kingdoms’ greatest champions.
- Fully compiled and updated Unbound rules, allowing you to recreate iconic large-scale battles with specialized rules to enhance gameplay.
- New narrative fiction picking up directly after the exciting events of WARMACHINE: Wrath.
- A painting and modeling guide to help you prepare your colossals for combat.
- Theme Force lists for each new warcaster, which allow you to create armies based on the specialized forces found in the WARMACHINE world.

FOCUS YOUR WILL AND CRUSH THE ENEMY BENEATH YOUR COLOSSAL MIGHT!
125683.name: Warmachine: Colossals

125684.name: Hells Canyon
125684.description:
User Summary:

Hells Canyon is a 21x20-inch battlemap contained on six 7x10-inch tiles.

125685.name: Battle of Twin Bridges
125685.description:
User Summary:

Battle of Twin Bridges is a 35x40-inch battlemap contained on 20 7x10-inch tiles.

125686.name: Mastery: A Game of Enlightenment
125686.description:
Mastery is played in two phases. In the first phase, players roll a die to move around a wheel trying to get rid of hand cards which symbolize the negative qualities of hate, anger, deceit, greed, and attachment. They can get rid of their cards by landing on appropriate spaces; this may involve giving the cards to other players or discussing a time they used that quality in a situation.

Once a player has gotten rid of all hadga cards and crossed the Rainbow Bridge, the second phase of the game begins for that player. Now the player rolls the die to move around the Mastery Oval, which contains the letters of the word mastery. Each turn, the player has the chance to earn a letter of the word mastery by answering a trivia question. The first person to receive all seven letters of mastery wins the game.

125687.name: Fruit Sorter Extreme
125687.description:
In-game Description

"Become a worker of a sorting plant and sort fresh fruit!

In Fruit Sorter your task is to sort different types of fruit moving on a belt and put them into boxes. Your task will be made easier by the so-called helpers who will be receiving boxes full of fruit. However, your task will not be so easy, because you will need to sort all the fruit before they reach the end of the belt and fall into the mill. You need to put into the boxes only the same fruit. You will get extra points for putting one or more fruit at the same time!"

125688.name: Stop spot!
125688.description:
In stop spot! the players contract chickenpox, some ointment, a syrup...can delay the plague of spots.
To play this game each player is given a face, boy or a girl and then the players take it in turns to turn over the cards. If you get a card with spots on it you have to add spots to your face, while the teddy bear or some ointment means you can remove spots. The winner is the player with the least spots at the end of the game.
A perfect game to play with kids when they are actually sick, it distracts them from how they are feeling!

125689.description: Both maps in SNCF: The Moon/Mars – an expansion compatible only with the first edition of SNCF and not with Paris Connection – are spherical. Track can be built to the edges of the map, with that track connecting to the corresponding number on the opposite side of the map. Both maps include special building instructions and end-of-game conditions.
125689.name: SNCF: The Moon/Mars

125690.name: Holy Rollers
125690.description:
Holy Rollers is a dice game where your group of saints tries to race your opponent's group of saints to the front of the church to find out who's holiest.

Players are represented by 3 dice "pawns" portraying the different sides of the characters' face so you can tell which way they're facing.

There are 4 direction dice and an action die, all of the directions must be used by one character die per turn, and the action die will give special directions.

There is also a countdown die for placing NPC saints in the front pew and 2 placement dice for saints and Bibles.

Players must land on a space with a Bible token to be allowed to sit in the front pew.

The first player to get 3 character dice with Bibles in the front pew of the church wins.

This game was designed to utilize all the copies of Yahtzee Jr. I had found thrifitng. You will need 3 indented dice for each player and 8 for the game, 10 tokens, and one play board.

125691.name: Final Freeway 2: Retro
125691.description:
The sequel to chart-topping retro racing game Final Freeway is set to wheel-spin onto a mobile device near you.

Final Freeway 2: Retro builds on the critical acclaim of the original which received overwhelming praise for the way it captured the authentic feel of old-school arcade racers.

We’ve listened to the fans of the first title and added the most requested features and then some more!

There are 14 different stages, paths to be picked in real time, a stubborn challenger that needs to be taught a lesson, selectable characters and more.

Major features:
- Old-school arcade racing through 14 unique stages
- Real-time road splits (choose your path as you go)
- Fast, fast driving action!
- Awesome pixel art, for a perfect retro feeling
- 3 fantastic pop-rock audio tracks (the 80s are here to stay!)
- 3 selectable characters, with different driving skills
- Crash sequences (watch out for that tree!)
- Game Center integration with Leaderboards and Achievements
- 6 different control schemes
- 3 difficulty levels
- Native support for iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad, Retina Display, etc.

Source: The Publisher Website.

125692.description:
Panic Station: Parasite Control is a mini-expansion for Panic Station that consists of exactly two new cards for the item deck:


Parasite Radar – Players can use this to reroll the die for parasite movement, making it a great tool for both humans and infected players.
Heavy Grenade – With more potential power, a heavy grenade can possibly cause more damage than usual, even to adjacent rooms.
125692.name: Panic Station: Parasite Control

125693.name: Fractal Combat
125693.description:
Fractal Combat is an action-packed futuristic flight combat game based on suggestive fractal worlds. FC sports a wide rage of items and vehicles to choose from and intense missile battles.

Major features:
- Fast-paced futuristic arcade flight combat
- Breathtaking explosion effects
- 7 unique gorgeous fractal landscapes
- 6 different ships and 2 distinct flight models
- Earn new ships, upgrade weapons, generators, radars
- Dozens of missions to complete
- Game Center’s Leaderboards and Achievements
- Retina and iPad display support
- Intuitive accelerometer and touch controls

The top notch 3D graphics will make your iOS device shine.
If you like missile shooting action, this game will keep you busy.

Source: The Publisher Website.

125694.name: Fit Freeway
125694.description:
Fit Freeway is the combination of our popular Final Freeway racing game and BitGym, the incredible workout system from Active Theory Inc.

Place your iPad 2 or iPhone 4/4s on your cardio machine and start racing!

There is no need for special cables or additional items. All you need is an iPad 2 or an iPhone 4/4S and a copy of Fit Freeway.

BitGym’s system translates the exercise machine vibrations into car speed in the game.

Steering is achieved by moving in the head left and right in font of the iPad 2 or iPhone. BitGym’s head tracking technology will detect head movements and translate that into steering controls in the game.

Source: The Publisher Website.

125696.name: ARC: A Region Charted Poster Maps
125696.description:
From the publisher:

ARC: A Region Charted map pack is a set of 10 full-color maps, each 18" by 24" intended for use in any fantasy game. Each map is a stand alone encounter location, but many maps also connect together allowing you to expand the encounter. With your support, we hope to release additional map packs and grow the region, adding value to all the maps you already own with each new expansion.

about the package
There are 10 maps, each 18 inch by 24 inch presented in duplicate (with grid and without grid) and then another 10 pages of GM aids to assist in encounter design.

videogame.104950: Dracula 3: The Path of the Dragon

125698.name: Dracula: The Path of the Dragon – Part 2

videogamecompilation.104950: Dracula 3: The Path of the Dragon

125698.description:
User Summary

Dracula – The Path of the Dragon part 2 is a first person adventure puzzle game. It continues where part 1 left. The game features a movement system instead of still screen to still screen. You can interact with characters, objects and animals.

videogame.104950: Dracula 3: The Path of the Dragon

125699.name: Dracula: The Path of the Dragon – Part 3

videogamecompilation.104950: Dracula 3: The Path of the Dragon

125699.description:
User Summary

Dracula – The Path of the Dragon part 3 is a first person adventure puzzle game. It continues where part 2 left. The game features a movement system instead of still screen to still screen. You can interact with characters, objects and animals.

videogame.104950: Dracula 3: The Path of the Dragon

125700.name: Dracula: The Path Of The Dragon – Part 1

videogamecompilation.104950: Dracula 3: The Path of the Dragon

125700.description:
User Summary

Dracula – The Path of the Dragon part 1 is a first person adventure puzzle game. The game features a movement system instead of still screen to still screen. You can interact with characters, objects and animals.

125701.name: Amoebattle
125701.description:
"Major warfare. Microscopic scale.
Real Time Strategy on iPad, iPhone and DSiWare

Lead your group of amoebas against a fast-spreading infection that threatens the microscopic world. Built from the ground up for the mobile touchscreen, Amoebattle delivers a highly unique RTS experience for newcomers and veterans alike.

A Microscopic World

Discover nine types of creatures, from the fast moving Shark to the indestructible Ursa. Journey through the beautiful yet alien landscapes, featuring a remarkable art style.

The Tide of Battle

Mutate into any other amoeba to fit your playstyle or try new tactics. Turn the tide of battle with powerful Probes, such as the Cryoprobe that slows enemies to a crawl.

Battle for Primordial Soup-remacy

Stop the infection and destroy its source in the varied and intense twelve-mission campaign. Show your dominance by conquering the challenging Game Center Achievements. Amoebattle brings the action and excitement of the RTS and reimagines it for iPad/iPhone and Nintendo 3DS/DSi to deliver an experience unlike anything else."

Source: The Game Website.

125702.description:
Caravans of Asia is a strategic game of trade and travel inspired by Marco Polo and the Silk Road. For thousands of years, merchant caravans have traversed the dusty routes of inner Asia, bearing strange and exotic goods from one corner of the world to the other.

In Caravans of Asia you become a merchant caravan seeking your fortune by trading goods across the continent – but beware, for there are many dangers that await you, from treacherous mountains to blinding sandstorms and thieving bandits. Your success will require wise decisions, an eye for danger, and a bit of luck.

Players buy and sell trade goods across Asia, responding to changing market conditions. You can cooperate and make deals with other players, or you can try to go it alone and make all the trades yourself. Manage your money carefully, and make sure you don't get too far in debt.
125702.name: Caravans of Asia

125703.description:
Empire of the dead is a tabletop skirmish game for two or more players, using 28 mm miniature models to represent each players band of characters.

The game is set in an age where a steampunk victorian empire rules the world. An empire fueled by an extraordinary discovery. The mineral that has become known as infernium. But all is not well, dark shadows from our deepest nightmares stalk the smog shrouded streets of London. An ancient evil is rising from defeat.

Players choose from 4 starter factions which they can expand and add to from a range of special character models. Each game is played over several turns, each turn consisting of four distinct phases.

During the maintenance phase players check for victory conditions defined by the specific scenario being played and resolves any issues created by the results of the previous turn, for example take dice rolls for wound recovery.

During the initiative phase players roll dice for initiative to determine who will activate its characters first.

During the activation phase the players activate their faction, one model at a time, moving, shooting and assaulting enemy models. Once the first player has activated all his models, the second player does likewise.

Finally, all close combat events is settled during the combat phase.

The easy to follow campaign rules and rich background create endless possibilities for gamers to build faction and achieve their own aims. Factions grow with each battle and may spend their hard-earned coins on new weapons, skills and attribute improvements.
125703.name: Empire of the dead

125705.name: Ancient Evil
125705.description:
Publisher's blurb:

NOTHING THIS EVIL EVER DIES!

Kingstown is a sleepy little town where folks just want to live undisturbed. But something unimaginable dwells nearby - something that wants to eradicate free thought, and subject humanity to enslavement and genocide. It is a pure malevolence older than Mankind's darkest primal nightmares. It is Ancient Evil!

Ancient Evil is a superhero role-playing adventure by V&V alumnus Stephen Dedman, for a team of 4 to 6 intermediate Villains and VigilantesTM or Living LegendsTM characters. Illustrations by Tod Smith, maps and color by Jeff Dee. Ancient Evil includes encounter tables, a timeline of events, stats for over a dozen new villains, and optional rules for underwater and zero-g combat in V&VTM!

125706.name: The Dread Codex: Goblins
125706.description:
Publishers Blurb:

"Where one can find a single goblin... one can find a thousand more."

Every adventurer, setting out on their first quest, has encountered the goblin. Depicted as cruel and simple creatures, they are often slain effortlessly by any competent player. So, how long before your player's become bored with these little pests, or too strong to even consider them a threat?

The Dread Codex: Goblins has all the answers you need! Provided are many ideas, suggestions, and game material for you to use in your PATHFINDER play sessions, including:

• Goblins as a Player Race
• 9 Playable Sub-races
• Goblin specific base classes
• Goblin feats
• Goblin weapons and Equipment
• New magical items
• New Monsters
....and tons of pre-made stat blocks ready for encounters!

A complete re-thinking of the Goblin, from the ground up, and all lavishly illustrated in full color!

125707.name: DarkStar One:  Broken Alliance
125707.description:
back of box:

In DarkStar One - Broken Alliance, command the mysterious spacecraft, the DarkStar One, allowing near infinite customisation capabilities using the latest and even mysterious alien weapons and technologies. Blast into space for in-your-face 3D combat in full 1080p High Definition, explore over 300 alien worlds, buy and sell cargo or services, all while exploring a vast and beautiful universe in a quest to uncover the mystery behind the main character's father.

Action and adventure in one exciting package - an innovative hybrid game that moves the player seamlessly between story-driven adventure, RPG customisation and action-packed space battles.

Play as pirate, trader, mercenary, bounty hunter, smuggler or assassin, configuring your ship accordingly, as the game world reacts to your actions and reputation.

Explore a universe of more than 300 solar systems populated by 6 distinct alien races with unique ship designs, tactics, behaviours and realistic economies.

Amazing visuals and sound - enjoy more than 35 hours of true 1080p High Definition game play, over 40 minutes of cut-scene story telling and 90 minutes of original music in Dolby 5.1 channel surround sound.

125708.description:
Turmoil has befallen the lands and the tribes are at war. Choose your which side you are on: Will you fight with the earthbound Troll tribes, who are determined to hold their wooded, mountainous homelands in the north against their foes? Will you establish dominion over the skies at the side of the ethereal Spirits? Do you share the fanatical rage of the Goblins keen on expanding their territories or will you help the solemn and elusive Merfolk protect their watery domains?
While war wages, mighty Spellcasters emerge from the depths of space and time, summoning mighty Creatures and casting powerful Spells to battle each other...

The aim of the game is to reduce the cards in your opponent’s card-deck (or Spellbook) to zero by using the Spells and Creatures in your Spellbook. Players take turns that always follow the same structure. For each point of damage a Player receives through Creatures or Spells, he or she puts the top card of his or her deck on his or her Discard Pile (or Archive). Is a player unable to draw a card, he or she loses immediately.

The third expansion of Elemental Clash is all about Creatures (it features more Creature and less Spell cards than previous sets), in particular the four major tribes, each being associated with one of the four elements: Trolls (Earth), Spirits (Air), Goblins (Fire) and Merfolk (Water). Furthermore, Elemental Clash:

In a "Mini-Expansion" included in the game, Tribes offers an exciting new variant of play, with Spellcaster cards being introduced. Players can choose one out of the ten different Spellcasters included and build a deck around him or her. Each Spellcaster has a pre-set deck size, hand size and number of cards which you draw each turn as well as a permanent "Static Ability" and a "Flip Ability" which gives you a certain benefit once, but shuts down the "Static Ability".

Featuring artwork of Enggar Adirasa and Andreas Propst.
125708.name: Elemental Clash: Tribes

125709.name: RoboRiot
125709.description:
RoboRiot is a light, family-friendly card game.

In RoboRiot you are competing with the other players in the Worldwide RoboRiot Tournament, in which Robot Engineers such as yourself are tossed into an arena full of mismatched Robot pieces. Your job is to scramble to put together the best bot you can, as quickly as you can, and hope it is strong enough to beat all of the others. If you win, you gain Medals. If you lose, you forfeit medals. Be the player with the most medals when one or more players runs out of them to claim victory!

125710.name: Grand Slam Baseball: Steve Garvey vs. Jose Canseco
125710.description:
From box:

Steve ("Iron Man") Garvey and Jose (Rookie of the Year) Canseco take you to the ballpark in a Grand Slam double-header. First, you have a regular baseball game, with all real-time action...sliders, curves, squeeze plays, stolen bases, home runs, and hit and run plays. All the excitement of major league baseball is seen in vivid color on scrolling outfield screens enhanced by realistic sound effects. Plus, there's a second game...a dynamic, new variation in which Grand Slam home runs score points for your team. The action and strategy are intensified as you, Steve and Jose match power and skill.

125711.name: Garden Pavilion
125711.description:
From the Introduction:

Waterways and ponds partially covered by water lilies dominate much of this charming classical garden. Gravel paths lead through the carefully sculpted landscape. An arched bridges built from polished red wood spans a narrow gap from the ponds' banks, fortified with carefully placed stones, to a small artificial island. On the island an octagonal pavilion built from the same red wood stands, inviting visitors to take a rest in its shaded interior and admire the landscape.

125712.name: GOdroid
125712.description:
GOdroid is an application for Android to play the strategic board game Go against the GPL Go engine GNU Go. It contains a Go board UI and minor changes to GNU Go.

Features

Play against human or computer opponent
Choose from one of ten AI strengths
Different board sizes (9x9, 13x13, 19x19)
Adjustable handicap and Komi
Japanese and Chinese scoring rules
One-touch board zoom
Unlimited undo/redo of moves
Highlighting of last three moves
Visualization of opponents final territory
Auto save/load current game
Save/load games (sgf format)
(English) description of game rules can be found in 'Menu -> Info -> Game rules'




Source: The Developer Website.

125714.name: Vector Ace
125714.description:
User Summary

Vector Ace is an Android version of a racing game in the vein of the pencil and graph paper game of Racetrack and its derivatives, Bolide and Tacara. The game uses vector movement with Newtonian physics: move too fast and you may not be able to slow down in time to avoid the wall. Can be played solitaire against the computer or 2-player hotseat. Comes with 7 tracks of varying lengths and difficulty. Expert mode increases the challenge by having the players pass through particular coordinates for extra points.

125715.name: Sailors on the Starless Sea

rpgpodcastepisode.142241: Dungeon Crawl Classics: Sailors on the Starless Sea

rpg.10737: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game

125715.description:
From the back cover:

Since time immemorial you and your people have toiled in the shadow of the cyclopean ruins. Of mysterious origins and the source of many a superstition, they have always been considered a secret best left unknown by the folk of your hamlet.

But now something stirs beneath the crumbling blocks. Beastmen howl in the night and your fellow villagers are snatched from their beds. With no heroes to defend you, who will rise to stand against the encircling darkness? The secrets of Chaos are yours to unearth, but at what cost to sanity or soul?

An introductory adventure for the Dungeon Crawl Classics Roleplaying Game, Sailors on the Starless Sea pits a mob of 0-level adventurers against the legacy of the Chaos Lords and their corrupted hordes. Delving beneath the crumbling ruins, the characters discover ancient crypts, a starless sea, and an ancient ziggurat, where death and treasure await in equal measure!

125716.name: Väike numbrikohver
125716.description:
2 decks of smaller-size and 1 deck of larger size cards with numbers 1-20 with 15 different games. Some games are old classic like memory etc. Some are new games.

f.e. Tell a number:
Both smaller cards with numbers 1-12 are used.
Each player gets 6 cards in hand.
In his turn player tell a number from 1 to 24 and all players try to find 2 cards with sum of that number. Who finds places this cards in front of him and draws 2 cards.
Each number may be used only once during the game.
Game ends if all cards are used and player who has the most cards is the winner.

125717.name: Livewire!
125717.description:
User Summary
Livewire! was inspired by the earlier game, Tempest. It is a railroad shooter for the Atari 800, created by Tom Hudson.

The Giant List of Classic Game Programmers
Livewire! first appeared as a type-in listing in ANALOG Computing, the magazine Tom worked for at the time.

125718.name: Tubeway
125718.description:
Tubeway is a simple shooter game in which the player uses paddles to move a small white cross-hair around the top of a "tube" or wall while firing down at the computer-controlled opponents attempting to scale their way up it. The opponents, known as the "Tubeway Army", consist of triangular green homers (100 points) and triangular blue seekers (200 points), both of which can return fire. A special opponent called the germ occasionally emerges from a white box in the lower left corner of the screen. The goal of the game is to clear as many levels as possible before running out of lives. An extra life is granted every 20,000 points.

Source: Wikipedia, "Tubeway (video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

125719.name: Corsair: Rules For Ships & The Sea
125719.description:
UNPUBLISHED PRODUCT




it appears this Item will never be published
this Item has been moved to (Unpublished Products)
there should be no product images submitted to this entry




Publisher's Blurb:

Sail Ho!

Everything you need to add historically-accurate sailing vessels to your Pathfinder campaigns, CORSAIR features complete rules for sailing, ship repair and customization, over 20 classes of vessels from the age of sail, naval combat and boarding actions, and full deckplans of a Brigantine, gridded for Pathfinder combat. CORSAIR is the perfect solution for any campaign, regardless of setting, looking to add the snap of sail-cloth, the sting of salt spray, and the thunderous roll of cannon-fire to the game.

Everything you need, all in one place. Set sail!


admin comment
this entry was added to the database in May 2012
moved to (Unpublished Products) on August 23, 2016
another troubled product by Gareth-Michael Skarka

125720.name: Keltia
125720.description:
Publisher blurb: (in French)

« Je sens que les dieux anciens se penchent, peut-être une dernière fois, sur les batailles sanglantes et les affrontements vains des chefs. Y reconnaîtront-ils le dernier appel de leurs enfants de l'Île des Forts ?

Daigneront-ils accorder au jeune héritier leur bénédiction séculaire ? Ou, indifférents aux cris et aux prières, s'endormiront-ils dans la pourpre et l'or des banquets éternels, la coupe au poing, rêvant de leurs prochaines incarnations ? Que Gwydyon et Beli Mawr nous guident ! »
-- Kadfael ap Cadno, barde

Keltia, les Chroniques du Roi-dragon vous ouvre les portes d'un royaume oublié, celui d'Arthur Pendraeg, Haut-roi de Bretagne. Plongez dans les origines galloises et celtiques du mythe, vous pourrez vivre des aventures palpitantes dans un cadre dense et fascinant, celui de l'Île de Beli Mawr, Ynis Prydein, encore légendaire. Intrigues politiques, combats, magie, et créatures monstrueuses vous y attendent.
Druide ou barde, chevalier ou guerrier des clans, prêtresse ou mage, les dieux anciens vous guideront dans les lieux mythiques de la légende originelle du Roi-Dragon.

Google translation:

I feel that the old gods are looking, perhaps for the last time on the bloody battles and clashes heads vain. Do they recognize the last call to their children Island Forts?

They deign to give the young heir their secular blessing? Or indifferent to the cries and prayers, do they fall asleep in the purple and gold of the eternal banquet, cutting in hand, dreaming of their next incarnations? What Gwydyon and Beli Mawr guide us! "
- Kadfael ap Cadno, bard

Keltia, Chronicles of the Dragon King opens the door to a forgotten kingdom, that of Pendraeg Arthur, High King of Britain. Immerse yourself in the Welsh and Celtic origins of the myth, you can experience exciting adventures in a dense and fascinating setting, the Island of Beli Mawr, Ynis Prydein still legendary. Political intrigues, fights, magic and monstrous creatures await you.
Druid and bard, knight or warrior clans, priestess or mage, the ancient gods will guide you in the mythical places of the original legend of the Dragon King.

User summary:

Keltia is an RPG in which you play with the Celts during the reign of Arthur Pendragon.

125721.name: Perils of the Sunken City
125721.description:
From publishers Website:

"The Great City is old and faded, a pale reflection of its former glory. Life is a challenge for most, but for the weak and unconnected, the city is a place of unrelenting hardship harboring neither hope nor promise of escape.

With one exception: the Sunken City.

Most find death in the crumbling ruins that stretch beyond sight into the mists; once rich districts now claimed by swamp and dark denizens. But for the desperate few, the ruins offer treasures the Great City denies them: fortune, glory, and a fighting chance!

Designed for 0-1st level characters, Perils of the Sunken City gives both an overview of the Sunken City: a consistent starting point to kick-off many adventures, and details Madazkan’s Court, the first Sunken City adventure. Once a necromancers deadly playground, the court is now home to an insane elemental, fearsome monsters and deadly traps!"

rpg.10737: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game

rpgpodcastepisode.175599: Dungeon Crawl Classics: Perils of the Sunken City

rpg.10737: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game

125722.name: The Ooze Pits of Jonas Gralk
125722.description:
From publishers Website:

"Where have the 3rd born of Croaker’s Bend gotten to?

Once again the mysteries of the sunken city have called to the desperate souls of the Great City. As the confusion of the sending fades, adventurers find themselves calf-deep in muck on the borders of a rustic village. The local folk seem friendly enough, but the relentless croaking issuing from the swamp eats away at any sense of calm. One begins to wonder: Why does every home show signs of mourning? And who is this Jonas Gralk that all seem to mention with dark suspicion?

Designed for 0-level adventurers, The Ooze Pits of Jonas Gralk introduces adventures to the colorful inhabitants of Croaker’s Bend. Could the folk of the village possibly be as kindly as they seem, or are they masking dark secrets? What dangers lurk in the swamps surrounding the village, and why do the children of the hamlet stare out into the mists with blank eyes and empty smiles? And where has the town’s mortician Jonas Gralk and every 3rd born member of the community disappeared to? Answers will be discovered in The Ooze Pits of Jonas Gralk!"

rpg.10737: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game

125723.name: A Gathering of the Marked
125723.description:
From publishers Website:

"Dark and sinister deeds await those who bear the mark!

Rich and poor, bond and free: every midwinter an unsuspecting few awake to find a ragged circle of midnight black scrawled on their foreheads, a dark summoning whispering on the edge of their consciousness. All who live in the shadow of the Great City know to ignore the call of the mark is to invite madness and a lingering and horrific death, so each will find his way to the sending stones, and the unspeakable peril that waits beyond.

Designed for 0-level adventurers, A Gathering of the Marked challenges a band of strangers to endure the mad games of a power who's motivations are as mysterious as its identity. Can the summoned survive to wrest control of their lives once more? Will they turn on those they struggle with, or band together to defeat a common enemy? Will they finally come face to face with the twisted power that has called them, and uncover its dark secrets? All will be revealed in A Gathering of the Marked!"

125724.description:
WARLIKE uses Deep hand and deck managing aspect with a large array of different options to move miniatures on battlefield map. Is similar to miniature war games.
Each card is representing a Unit from a different Fantasy World.

Your Deck reflects your personality.
Your Cards represent the Units, Equipment, Spells and Tactics you have at your disposal as you play.
Your Life and the lives of your trusted armies will depend on your skill as a strategist. To win this endless war, you must ultimately destroy the enemy.

It is pretty short in length for a war game.
Each army plays different, each has a distinct appearance and background.
Players can customize their Faction Decks.

During the game:
Players set up the two different resource regions consisting using up to five Villages or Locations cards.
At the start of each turn, active player draws 2 cards, which are played onto the battlefield during play. All of them are promoted to more powerful movement style using own Skills. Most of these Units have special abilities (e.g., teleportation, Jumping, Double Attack …).


The Rules are stoopid simple, and yet the different clans and their cards are all so brilliantly constructed that this quick-playing game can easily hog all your table-time.
This is an incredibly deep game, and it takes a number of games to internalize your own options, much less your opponent's.
The game is NOT collectible, but is fully customizable!

This miniature-like card-board game was inspired by Heroscape, HeroClix, MTG, Mage Knight Board Game, Mage Wars and other cool games themed around a fantasy style.
125724.name: Warlike: Goblins vs Pirates vs Ninjas vs Robots vs Elves vs Zombies  vs Vampires

125725.name: Zaxx
125725.description:
User Summary

Zaxx is a Zaxxon clone (isometric shoot'em up) written by Carlo Perconti and published by Chip. The game has seven levels.

125726.name: Murmeli, pass uf!
125726.description:
Marmots are crazy for flowers. But they must be careful when they walk through the lush meadows and look for their favorite meal. Fox and eagles are in fact crazy for these little animals...

The flowers in 3 colors are distributed on the game board face-up.
In his turn player rolls dice and take the action indicated.
If die shows flower the player moves his marmot the nearest place with the flower with proper color.
If die shows arrow player may move one step with his marmot.
If die shows burrow player may move his marmot to any burrow.
If die shows danger player removes one of the eight burrow-cards from the play so there are now less places to hide.

The game ends when a player has lost both marmots or when all
the flowers of one color were collected. This is when the player with the most flowers that wins the game.

125727.name: Triple Comando
125727.description:
User Summary

Using stolen blueprints, a south-american government has built a super weapon in a lab in a jungle. This weapon, the Positronic Gun is a danger to world peace and must be destroyed. Three mercenaries, Charlie Montinni, Humphrey Stallone and Billy von Pettet are sent on this dangerous mission.

The game uses a top-down view. It can be played by up to three players cooperatively. The player must navigate through dozens of jungle screens before reaching the Positronic Gun. Weapons include a rifle, proximity mines, grenades, a knife and artillery strikes.

125728.name: Phantasy Star Online Episode III: C.A.R.D Revolution
125728.description:
Game box

Fate's Deck Awaits You
Once again war rages on the planet Ragol in the third installment of the Phantasy Star Online saga. Experience a new style of strategic combat as you draw upon powerful cards to wage battle against your opponents. Choose the path of the Hero or the Arkz, and enter into the conflict that rages on the planet Ragol as the next generation of Hunters. Your fate as victor or victim has never been more in your hands.

125729.name: Death's Edge
125729.description:
From rear cover and product introduction:

The village of Nerasi has been at war for as long as you can remember. Hordes of undead, led by a powerful necromancer named Draya (also known as "The Dark Mistress"), have descended in to the valley countless times over the last century. But this time something is different: they seem more organized, more coordinated, more bloodthirsty... and the village is in jeopardy more than ever. With the safety of the village on the line, every man and woman that was capable of swinging a blade was sent to battle. Even though the village was nowhere near the front line it was left undefended, presumed safe due to its distance from the conflict.

Now, while the battle continues in an area known as The Fields of Bone, a small group of undead creatures have found their way in to the village. With no heroes to defend the common folk, it is now up to you - the above average commoner - to drop the shovel or take off the apron, pick up the nearest weapon and defend yourself and your loved ones from the approaching invaders.

DM1: Death's Edge is a short delve for a group of of level 0 characters, compatible with the Dungeons and Dragons 4th Edition game system. It is the first part in a three part series called The Dark Mistress Saga. Characters must be created using the guidelines published in the article "A Hero's First Steps" by Philippe-Antoine Menard in Dragon issue #403, available on the Wizards of the Coast website (DDI subscription required).

125730.name: Running Gear
125730.description:
From the back of the book:

Finally: a third-edition version of the acclaimed running gear net.sourcebook
Explosives, vehicles, skate gear, magical equipment, melee weapons, drugs, spells, firearms
This new edition of the Running Gear updates the original sourcebook to conform to the Shadowrun, Third Edition rules, and also includes much of the gear and the spells from Tech Specs. As an added bonus, there's even some entirely new gear!
What more does a shadowrunner need?
No ISBN, barcode or costs!
Plastic Warriors

125731.name: Fate of the Norns (1st Edition)
125731.description:
Designer's Description:

Legend has it that during every man's birth, the three Norns come to discuss his destiny and time of death. When they decide that man’s fate, no mortal or deity may change the course of the future. It is said that even Ragnarok, the twilight of the Gods, was determined by the Norns.

Fate of the Norns is a complete 320 page role-playing game that includes everything the game master and players will need to start their Viking adventures!

Features:


A vivid setting where the Viking comes to life!
15+ Occupations to choose from
6 Magic systems, with countless spells, runes, charms, enchantments, etc...
Simple to use skill & percentile game engine
100 pages of mythological denizens to populate your game world
Where death in glorious battle leads to a new and more prosperous beginning (Viking afterlife rules!)

125732.name: Rakshazar: Erste Schritte auf dem verfluchten Kontinent
125732.description:
(from the back of the book)
This publication contains:

- a description of the region Kurotan, the city Kurotan and the cultures thereof
- 6 unique heroe-characters of the Land of Giants
- a selection of weapons, armours, magic spells and monsters typical for the Land of Giants
- the scenario "Blutiger Tribut" (blood toll)
(user summary)
this is a starter kit for Rakshazar, also called Land of Giants, the mythic eastern continent of the DSA-RPG

125733.name: Air Boarder 64
125733.description:
Game box

The year is 2064. The snowboard and skateboard of the previous century have evolved into an AirBoard that hovers about 50cm above the ground.

This AirBoard can be ridden over ground, over water, and even along the walls of buildings from roof top to roof top!

There are no courses in AIRBOARDER 64 must be strictly followed [sic], so you are free to ride around the whole field and perform a variety of cool tricks! Go for it and become a Master of AirBoarder.

125734.name: Bike Route
125734.description:
Bike Route is a game of bike safety. In Bike Route, each player takes on the role of a bicyclist traveling on a roadway which has many of the hazards and street signs that one would encounter in everyday bike travel. The winner is the first player to traverse the board and successfully return "home."

The game is played in turns; on a turn the active player rolls a die and advances her token the number of spaces indicated on the die. If the space has a road sign on it, the player must obey the instructions on the sign; if it has a "Bike Route" sign, the player must take a Bike Route card and follow the instructions on it.

125735.name: Business Cycles
125735.description:
Business Cycles is an abstract game of chance and risk aversion. In Business Cycles, players play the role of entrepreneurs or CEOs directing three separate businesses over the course of a 40 year career. The winner is the player who retires with the greatest lifetime earnings after shepherding her businesses across the board.

Business Cycles is played in turns; on a turn a player rolls two dice and moves one or two business tokens along the game board, which is a track with 40 spaces. Some spaces have positive effects, some negative, and some require the player to take a card, which may be positive, negative, or neutral. Players must use both dice if possible and two tokens may not occupy the same space. A player one of whose tokens lands on a positive (profit) space immediately takes another turn, and continues to do so until she ends a turn in which she has only landed tokens on negative or card-drawing spaces.

Bearing business tokens off at the end of the board must be done by an exact roll; once one player has borne off all of her businesses, each player who went after her in the initial turn order gets one more turn (so that all players will have had the same number of turns). At that point, the player with the most money wins the game.

125737.name: Beneath the City of the White Wolf
125737.description:
publisher blurb

Middenheim, City of the White Wolf, where oaths are sworn, throats are slit and a terrifying evil lurks within the mighty rock upon which the city stands.

You are Absalom Kross, a devoted member of the Knights Panther, a sect of fanatical warriors who make up the honour guard of Boris Todbringer, Count of Middenheim. You are dedicated to the Count's protection and the defence of the City of the White Wolf.

While out in the forest surrounding the city, you uncover evidence of a plot to destroy Middenheim from within and are dispatched to bring its perpetrators to justice. Armed only with wits, brawn and your trusty blade, you must battle past some of the fiercest monsters in the Old World to save the city from certain doom.

125738.name: PARticipation
125738.description: PARticipation is a golf game. Players spin a spinner in order to determine their shots, which are kept track of on molded plastic three-dimensional terrain. Putting is done with a life-sized putter and golf-ball included with the game, with the idea being that the players will set up their own "greens" a la miniature golf with varying levels of difficulty.

125739.name: The Third Annual Neo-Anarchists Guide to Everything Else

rpgissue.14487: The Annual Neo-Anarchists Guide to Everything Else

125739.description:
From the Coontents list:

Bulletin Board, Chambana, Illinois, The Meat Market, Apparitions, Virtual Reality, The Rolodex, Dragoncult,
The Ice Box, Defining Points in World History, The Black Market, The Spirit is Strong, On-Line Grimoire, Master Spell List Addenda, The Spirit Guide, Summoning Creatures, Mirror, Mirror, On the Wall, Waking th'Dead, The Catalyst, The Chipper, Index

125740.name: The Haunted House: Save the Children!
125740.description:
A dirt, dead-end road with a church, a cemetery and, looming eerily behind, a dilapidated, abandoned, old Haunted House.

This is a frightening place where children have entered and have not been heard from in days.

Your job is to enter the Haunted House and find the four children before your own sad demise.

It is a dangerous and difficult task, for inside, one will find many ghosts, giant spiders, flesh-eating rats, traps, dead-ends, spine-tingling noises, foul odors, and other horrors of unspeakable danger.

It is your duty. God speed, my friend....

The Haunted House - Save the Children is a fun, fast, and easy, card and dice game used with any normal deck of cards (with one Joker), a pair of 6-sided dice, pen and paper.

THE RULES

You have 25 LIFE points - You hit 0, you die!

Shuffle the cards and enter the House by turning over the top card.

ACES
These are the children. Grab all four of them and GET THE HELL OUT!

DEUCE
This is a safe room. Nothing happens. Take a deep breath, your stay here doesn’t last long....

THREE - TEN
Every time you turn over one of these cards you must roll the dice and hope to get an “equal” or “over” roll, or get -1 taken away from LIFE.

JACKS
These ghosts are mean. Meet one, get -2 deducted from your LIFE.

KINGS
Horribly frightening spiritual creatures! Come across one and get -3 LIFE.

QUEENS
These ghosts are of a nurturing nature and encouraging to your venture. Meet one and get +2 LIFE.

JOKER
Oh no ... this evil ghost is too powerful, it could kill you! Absolutely Horrifying! See it and get -5 from LIFE.

The PDF with instructions will be available for download below.

125741.name: Running Gear
125741.description:
From the back of the book:

You need every edge you can get.
On the streets of the Sprawl, you don't get a second chance if your opponent has the better equipment. Get yourself the latest gear, and know what they will be using against you.
RUNNING GEAR is a compilation of articles, both from the Internet and newly-written, to provide Shadowrun players with new and varied equipment. It covers topics such as weapons, explosives, drugs, and other vital needs for the serious shadowrunner.
RUNNING GEAR is an unofficial sourcebook for SHADOWRUN, SECOND EDITION.

125742.name: Emmerlaüs: Abundance
125742.description: Fixed deck of 50 additional cards to play with Emmerlaüs: Duel of Mages and/or its other expansions (Communion, Destiny, Power).

125743.name: Emmerlaüs: Destiny
125743.description: Fixed deck of 50 additional cards to play with Emmerlaüs: Duel of Mages and/or its other expansions (Abundance, Communion, Power).

125744.name: Jet Heroes
125744.description:
User Summary

Jet Heroes is a scrolling shooter game, You have to take on several enemies and become the Ace of the skies! The game feature experience points, the more missions won, more fighters to choose from.

125745.name: Blackhand’s Street Weapons 2057
125745.description:
From the back of the book:

Knives. Pistols. Swords. Tasers. Clubs. Shotguns. Whips. Missile launchers. Crossbows. Rifles. Ammo.

Who needs any of ’em anymore, anyway? A good shadowrun is one in which you don’t have to fire a shot, they tell you these days. The old-timers still tell stories of how they used to go in “guns a-blazin’” and get away with it, but the new generation of runners knows better.

Or so they think. There are times when absolutely nothing is going to save you, except for a good weapon.

And this is where Blackhand’s book comes into the picture. It contains 293 melee weapons, firearms, and a few hard to classify gadgets, any one of which can mean the difference between living and dying to a shadowrunner.

No matter what end of the weapon they’re on.

This Plastic Warriors book contains all the weapons from the Cyberpunk 2020 sourcebook, but with their statistics and peculiarities converted to Shadowrun. If you need a weapon for some reason, look no further than this book—there’s something in it for everyone.

125746.name: Knight Crusades
125746.description:
User Summary

In Knight Crusades you have to battle from Castle to Castle. You are the leader commanding and you will have to work your way up to commanding Archers, Wizards, Healers, Knights, Horsemen and Catapults until you have gained control of the Kingdom.

125747.name: Die Bürgermeister
125747.description:
Win most mayors in each part of Austria to win the game.
Each round, the player draws a card and follows the resulting event. Afterwards he can place mayors, the first two for free and paying some money for each additional one. With good placement, mayors of other players can be removed, but only two mayors per round and state can be placed.

The player with the most money (cash and value of the placed mayors) wins the game.

125748.name: Memory Match Fun
125748.description:
User Summary

Memory Match Fun is a memory match game. To play you have to match the same pair of pictures. It features animals, fruits, and plant pictures. You can play solo or up to 4 players.

125749.name: Steam and Iron
125749.description:
Website: http://www.navalwarfare.net

Step into the shoes of Jellicoe or Scheer in this latest naval simulator featuring naval battles of World War One. Control the mighty battlelines at Jutland, the greatest fleets ever to clash, or command the Emden against the Sydney if you prefer a gentlemanly single ship duel. Pound the enemy with long range gunnery or order desperate torpedo attacks to save your battered dreadnoughts. Sneak around enemy coasts to lay a minefield or try to bring on a major fleet action. Meet the enemy in the North Sea, the Adriatic, the Black Sea or the South Atlantic. Command the navies of Germany, Britain, Russia, Italy or Austria-Hungary. Make your own what if-scenarios. Which was the best armored cruiser ever built, the Blucher or the Rurik? Make them fight one on one to find out!

Game features:

Tactical - operational scale. Scenarios last from an hour up to several days.
Continuous action in one minute segments.
Covers any naval battle in World War One, from a single ship duel to the battle of Jutland.
Includes submarines, minefields and air recon.
Realistic command and control.
Nations included: Germany, Britain, Italy, Russia, Austria-Hungary, Turkey, France.
Individual ships accurately modelled with armor, guns, torpedo protection etc.
Realistic hit and damage results, including critical hits on rudder, fire control, bridge etc.
Strong AI.
Accurately modelled weather, night and day and visibility effects.
Comand options range from Admiral's mode with realistic FOW and command and control limitations, to captain's mode where most aspects and details can be controlled by the player.
Mission objectives include sinking enemy ships, minelaying, bombardment and flying off airstrikes.
Fight battles anywhere in the world.
Scenario and ship editor included.
Battle generator included with a range of setup options.




Source: http://www.navalwarfare.net.

125750.name: Chromebook Conversions
125750.description:
From the back of the book:

Cyberpunk has all the cool stuff that’s sorely missing from Shadowrun right?

Well, no longer!

This Plastic Warriors book converts 99.9% of all items in the
three Chromebooks to Shadowrun!

You can now equip your characters with loads more goodies than possible ever before! Ranging from must have to completely useless, the gear, cyberware, vehicles, chips, and whatever else you care to name that are in here are sure to give that extra touch to any Shadowrun character!

Immediately usuable in any SHADOWRUN campaign, though it is highly recommended that players buy the CHROMEBOOKS in order to use these conversions fully.

125751.name: The Game of Catching Mice
125751.description:
for 2 players

Each player having 6 different colored counters each for mice and an indicator.
The object is to win mice (counters) by stopping a players men on the letters M,I,C, and E.

Players spin the indicator and place their mouse on the start places in order. Using either end of the arrow obtained from the spinner result. If the player hits upon an "M" he takes one of his mice and outs it on the blue track opposite the "M". The players having obtained an M then try to get the I,C, and E, The MIC & E may be separated by many spaces but must follow in order. In the case that a player does not obtain the next needed letter he must move forward the number of spaces shown on either end of the arrow. If a piece falls opposite an opposing mouse, the mouse is returned to the center of the board to be used again. If a player obtains a letter and there are only mice of an opposite color in the center he takes one of them and exchanges it for one of his own color, No two men or mice may occupy the same space. The player having the most mice home at the end wins the game

166006.name: Race! Formula 90: Expansion #1 – RF90 Series Championship

125752.description:
Race! Formula 90 is a car-racing game simulating all the typical elements of a motor sport event: car strategies, weather changes, pit stops, tire management, overtaking, doubling, and of course damages and crashes.

In Race! every game turn represents one or more laps of the track, and each player is in control of only one car. Other cars, called robots, move automatically on the track fighting between them and the human players. Players are provided with a set of racing cards and a car chart to keep track of all available resources (tires, damages, reliability). By playing racing cards, they move along the track and in so doing they spend resources. Movement can be affected by trajectories on the track, straight, corner and braking sections, opponents and other special events like yellow or blue flags.

Braking sections have a particular feature: here players and robots can try late braking, a dangerous maneuver that allows them to overtake multiple cars simultaneously. Other maneuvers or cards require a "check", e.g., playing a card with a check value lower than a predefined target.

Strategies and driving skills are another key element of the game. Players must exploit these unique capabilities to gain against competitors while adapting their driving style to the actual race conditions. When using a strategy at his best, a player achieves a "special", which allows him to draw a track card, which is usually more powerful than ordinary racing cards.

Race! is a board game with no dice in which strategy and risk melt together to convey a truly intense and deep racing experience. Usually the winning player combines excellent management of his car together with a pinch of opportunism and bravery.
125752.name: Race! Formula 90

125753.name: Isoroku's War 1941-1943
125753.description:
Campaign level wargame for Early half of World War 2 Pacific Theater.
The game map covers from Ceylon to Hawaii. The game not include Chinese front.
Each unit represent one capital ship or one battle ship and its escorts, land aircraft or land unit.

Players control either Japanese Navy or Allied Navy. Players manage movement and combat. Japanese player also manage naval fuel.
The game map divide to two type of positions, points and areas. The point represent port or aircraft base. The area represent sea between points. The aircraft carrier can move and attack both points and areas. Other units can only move to points and can only attack to points, but surface fleet is require for conquer of points.

Winner determined by victory point. Each important points has a random victory point chit. Allied player can examine those chits at any time. Japanese player can not examine until occupied by Japanese force.

125754.description:
Includes 212 counters providing Australian infantry among others, 8" x 22" geomorphic board (PTO1), and 12 scenarios.

DP #1 The O-Patchers! American Japanese 1945-02-01 Digger Pack I
DP #2 Volckmann's Guerillas Filipinos Japanese 1945-06-14 Digger Pack I
DP #3 Koepang Bang Japanese Australian/Dutch 1942-02-20 Digger Pack I
DP #4 Battle at Baliuag American Japanese 1941-12-31 Digger Pack I
DP #5 Oil Strike! Japanese Australian/British/Dutch 1942-02-14 Digger Pack I
DP #6 Night Dragons Japanese Australian 1942-08-26 Digger Pack I
DP #7 Deceptive Reception Japanese Australian 1942-01-14 Digger Pack I
DP #8 The South Side of Green New Zealand Japanese 1944-02-16 Digger Pack I
DP BONUS #1 Tenaru Tussle American Japanese 1942-08-21 Digger Pack I
DP BONUS #2 One Last Charge Australian Japanese 1942-01-20 Digger Pack I
DP BONUS #3 Biak Probe Japanese American 1944-06-15 Digger Pack I
DP BONUS #4 Lights Out American Japanese 1944-10-17 Digger Pack I
125754.name: Digger Pack I

125755.description:
Game description from the publisher:

The Memoir '44 Equipment Pack is a major expansion to the Memoir '44 game system and fills a game box as big as the original board game. With 186 plastic figures, the Equipment Pack includes 108 figures from four WWII nations, including French Infantry, Finnish Ski Troops, Italian Artillery and Polish Cavalry; 24 new pieces of Artillery (Flak-88's, "Long Tom" Big Guns, M7 Priests and "Screaming Meemies" Nebelwerfers); new Beach Landing equipment that includes six amazing Hobart's Funnies, complete with accessories; six Snipers; and scores of new Armor, Vehicle and Special Weapon Assets, including some Elefant Tank Destroyers, Kübelwagen Command cars, and M2 Mortars and Machine Guns.

These figures can be deployed over many of the existing Memoir '44 scenarios and are also heavily featured in the eleven Standard, two Breakthrough and four Overlord new scenarios that come in the Equipment Pack. A rules booklet and 25 Summary cards complement this pack. This expansion requires at least one copy of the Memoir '44 base game. Many of its expansions are required to enjoy most of the included scenarios. We recommend that players at minimum own the Terrain Pack and the Winter/Desert board.
125755.name: Memoir '44: Equipment Pack

125756.description:
ATS TT: Omaha West, is the Table Top(TT) edition recreating the Omaha landings. ATS Table Top games feature smaller counters and map hexes than normal ATS games. Personnel are on 1/2" counters, and vehicles are on 5/8" counters.

Below is the official blurb about the game...

Bam! Below is your first peek at ATS OMAHA EAST ... the massive second part of the series that will result in a record-breaking LARGEST TACTICAL-LEVEL BOARD WARGAME EVER PUBLISHED. The hexes are ATS TT-sized, and you'll need to own ATS TT OMAHA WEST to play OMAHA EAST.

Lots of smaller scenarios are the order of the day ... and of course, a follow on to "Black Day for the 116" ... the ultimate monster, depicting the entire landing across almost TWELVE FEET of map area! You owe it to yourself ... once in this life ... to set it all up and experience something that has never been done ... never been attempted ... in tabletop gaming before.

And before you quibble, whimper, and have your morale plummet into your boots ... four cheap plastic sawhorses here and two 4' × 8' sheets cut down to two 3' × 6' sheets ... easily transported at that size ... and you have the perfect stadium for giant gaming.
125756.name: ATS TT: Omaha West

125757.name: ATS TT: Battle of the Bulge 1
125757.description:
THIRIMONT, BELGIUM, 15 January 1945: By the end of 1944 the German offensive in the Belgian Ardennes was definitely stopped. But the Allies still had to push the Germans back behind the Siegfried Line before they could resume their strike into the Reich. By January 13—eleven days after it was launched —the counteroffensive had expanded far enough to the east along the battle line to engage the American 30th Infantry Division into the fight, with the capture of St. Vith as a first objective. While its sister regiments were plowing south over the hills, the 120th Regiment was locked in a bitter three-day struggle for Thirimont, a ridge village which controlled the east flank of the attack. By irony of fate, this village was defended by the 1st Battalion of the 9th Fallschirmjaeger Regiment, the same unit, whose soldiers so full of confidence, earlier rode on the tanks of the powerful Kampfgruppe Peiper, and had traversed Thirimont one month earlier on the way to the Meuse bridges.

Here comes an entirely NEW way to enjoy your ATS gaming: Geomorphic boards that link in a myriad of ways! And no one has a cooler scenario collection to put you into the action with on the new boards like CH! Battle of the Bulge I for ATS TT includes all the combat counters and large markers you need to play, just bring your ATS rulebook and play aids and the standard ½" small marker counter sheet and you are ready for this all new take on the Battle of the Bulge and ATS gaming!

125758.name: ATS TT: The Battle of Pork Chop Hill
125758.description:
ATS TT: The Battle of Pork Chop Hill is a Table Top game, meaning it features smaller counters and map hexes than normal ATS games.

IRON TRIANGLE’ OUTPOST PORK CHOP HILL, 1025 Hours, 6 July 1953: At 1025 hours on the night of July 6th a massive artillery and mortar barrage preceded an onslaught by 700 soldiers from the CCF 200th Regiment, 67th Division. The sounds from the crashing shells concealed the oncoming Chinese, until they burst forward in what was described as “a moving carpet of yelling, howling men--whistles and bugles blowing, their officers screaming like women driving their men uphill.” In a bunker CP just beneath the crest of the hill Corporal Dale W. Cain heard his radio come alive with reports of “enemy in large numbers”. Company A reported hand-to-hand fighting in the trenches. The battle was fought in a driving monsoon rain, making evacuation of the wounded difficult, as well as re-supply. As the battle swayed back and forth, the Chinese made repeated pushes to take the hill while both sides unleased a storm of artillery fire upon the struggling soldiers. During the course of two days, parts of four companies defended Pork Chop. At dawn on July 8th, the rain ended for a time and the initial defenders withdrawn. A fresh unit, 2nd Battalion of the 17th, counter-attacked and re-took the hill, then settled in to prepare a defensive perimeter for the coming night.

We suspect the majority of you out there have witnessed the movie "Pork Chop Hill" more than once, with its stirring performance by Gregory Peck. If you are like us, you've seen it over and over again. It's just that good. Our feelings about this film are on par with those we reserve for YOU, our customers, the historical wargamer with the imagination and daring to break out of the rusty cage, genre-wise, that someone once told you was the only place you could maneuver your cardboard warriors. And it is for YOU, the decisive "Lt. Joe Clemons" of tac-sim gamingthat we've created a nifty little treat known as ATS TT BATTLE OF PORK CHOP HILL. It includes an historical map and 6 scenarios all playable on the historical map. PORK CHOP HILL I for ATS TT includes all the combat counters and large markers you need to play, just bring your ATS rulebook and play aids and the standard ½" small marker counter sheet and you are ready to dive into the movie as if you were there!

125760.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim – Dawnguard

videogamehonor.31934: 2012 Game Critics Best Role Playing Game of the Year Nominee

125760.description:
User Summary:

Dawnguard is the first game add-on for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. The aim of the game is to stop a vampire group from blotting out the sun. The player can join a group called Dawnguard to stop the plans, or join the vampires.

According to Todd Howard the DLC will give 10-20 hours of new content.

125761.name: Dead Head Fred

videogamehonor.31830: 2007 Game Critics Best Handheld Game of the Year Nominee

125761.description:
Box Description:

A classic tale of murder, corruption, revenge...

And interchangeable heads!

Get your head in the game, as you use the all-new head-swapping system to take on the power of 9 unique noggins to get revenge on the man who took yours.

125764.name: Short Track Racing: Trading Paint
125764.description:
Box Description:

Short Track is where it all begins!

Strap yourself in and burn up the track in 7 ruthless vehicle classes. Trade paint and do whatever it takes to cross the finish line first. Do you have the nerves of steel to become a champion?

Race to the Finish Line!

Prove your skills on 20 tracks and 7 different vehicle classes includingStock Car, 3/4 Midgets, Modified, Wingless Sprint, Late Model, Hobby Stock or Truck.

Test your Driving Mettle!

Prove your worth and move up in the ranks in 3 different game modes--Rookie, Veteran and Pro.

Tuning and Customization!

Fine tune every part of your car from the tire pressure to the steering ratio.

125765.description:
Life is full of hard decisions and conflicts that must be resolved: Who is going to take out the trash? Whose turn is it to feed Schrödinger’s cat? Who has the best imaginary super-power? Which is better, Star Trek or Star Wars? For those who really want to resolve these questions in the most scientific way possible, there is now Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock Dice! Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock was invented by Sam Kass and brought to the world by the popular sitcom The Big Bang Theory. Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock Dice brings all the fun of Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock into a game that everyone can enjoy! For those of you who don’t know what Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock is or how it works, here’s a quick review:

Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock. It’s very simple. Look, scissors cuts paper. Paper covers rock. Rock crushes lizard. Lizard poisons Spock. Spock smashes scissors. Scissors decapitates lizard. Lizard eats paper. Paper disproves Spock. Spock vaporizes rock. And as it always has, rock crushes scissors.

In Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Dice, each player has a six-sided die with images representing each of the possible choices. The sixth side indicates a Reroll. Players all roll their die, if you are eliminated and do not eliminate someone else, you are out. The last person left wins the game.
125765.name: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Dice

125766.name: Fruit Basket
125766.description:
Players progress through the orchard by rolling the color die. But they can only advance to the color thrown if they can remember the location of the matching fruit memory token. The first to reach the colorful fruit basket wins.


A roll and move and memory game. Players roll a colour die. The colour die lets them move to the next fruit of that colour (red = strawberry, yellow = banana etc.). But to keep their place they just rolled they must also turn over one of the 8 hidden disks in the middle of the gameboard. If the disk has the same fruit they landed one pictured they stay where they are (further ahead). If its another colour, they go back to the nearest fruit of that colour. If it's the black disk they must go back to last place. First player reaching the end of the path (coloured fruit basket) with a fruit colour rolled is the winner.

125767.name: Avalon Heroes
125767.description:
Avalon Heroes is a tactical game and a battle game with exciting online DotA matches. In this free-to-play online RTS RPG, you can create your own Kin, master up to 100 Heroes, play together or against friends and foes for the two factions Oriens and Aeonia. Will you discover the perfect strategy for the battle game Avalon Heroes?

To play the tactical game Avalon Heroes, all you need to do is to sign up for free at alaplaya and to download the game at no cost on the website. Enter the fray with your strategy and let the battle game begin! The tactical game Avalon Heroes is inspired by DotA and powered by the eSports community. The famous Korean eSports clan WeMade FOX is also behind Avalon Heroes and fights exciting eSports battle game matches.

Source: The Publisher Website.

125768.name: Fragments of a Shattered Mind
125768.description:
From the front page of the PDF:
In the human bastion of Almraiven, a gifted magical scholar has gone missing. Agents of the Efreet Lord Memnon are known to be interested in her studies; has she been kidnapped for her knowledge, or is something more subtle afoot? A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Calimshan for characters of the Paragon tier (levels 11-20).
Note: This adventure takes place prior to the events chronicled in the first three Year 3 Calimshan Story Adventures, and is a stand-alone story. There is no connection between this adventure and CALI3-1 through CALI3-3, so players need not make any special effort to play this adventure with the same character who plays the other Calimshan adventures.

125769.name: Mark & Bein: Autorennen
125769.description:
Motor racing game published in the Pöppel-Revue magazine, Issue 72.

The track is marked in small squares. Each player uses a different coloured pencil. In a turn you can set your speed, which starts at 1. This lets you move one square. On subsequent turns you can increase or decrease your spped by 1. So a car travelling at speed 3 may, next turn, go down to 2, go up to 4, or to stay at 3.

Your move is drawn on to the board, so different colored pencils or pens is essential. All movement must be in a straight line for each move, so you can only change direction on your next throw, and so on. Thus, it is possible to crash if you go too fast around a corner. Forward planning is required.

The torturous track is, in effect, a figure of eight. First car home, wins.

125770.name: Figure Me Out: a game to help children learn about others
125770.description:
From the publisher:
This game helps kids get to know each other. The game develops social skills by helping children learn to gather information about others and share information about themselves. Children take turns assuming the role of a reporter, getting to the bottom of a story by using Who, What, When, Where, and How questions to figure out what another player is thinking. These conversational skills are used to teach children how to begin and maintain an interesting conversation. A variety of topics (a hobby that interests me, a movie I saw recently, my favorite season, etc.) are used to generate ideas, or stories, for the players to figure out. The object of the game is to complete a full circuit of the game board and file your story by the deadline. Designed for children with Asperger Syndrome in mind. Said to help kids develop the social skills needed to begin and hold a conversation.

125771.name: Resistance: Burning Skies
125771.description:
August 1951: the attack on North America's east coast begins…

As New Jersey fire fighter and National Guardsman Tom Riley, you’re about to come face to face with the brutal Chimeran invasion force in this blistering shooter built from the ground up for PlayStation®Vita System. The latest installment in the acclaimed Resistance franchise focuses on an all-new mission that parallels and complements the existing Resistance storyline, as Tom Riley rises from an everyday hero to a legend of the Resistance.
Key Features:

The first ever portable first-person shooter with true dual-analog control. Console-quality shooting in the palm of your hand.
Competitive 8-player online multiplayer across 6 unique maps and 3 modes
A frenetic campaign mode told from an entirely new perspective in the Resistance
Developed from the ground-up to take full advantage of the power of PlayStation®Vita System, delivering the ultimate portable shooter experience with front and rear touch control, 3G/Near support, and online
play via wi-fi.

Source: The Publisher Website.

125773.name: Hoch Lebe Opa!
125773.description:
Long Live Grandad is a card game appropriately suitable for the different generations within a family to play together.

The 66 cards are shuffled and each player is dealt 6 cards. In a turn a player hopes to lay face-up one card that will add more length to his current family. Each family must begin with an Opa Solo Card. Once started a family can be extended by adding a numbered card. After the Opa card has started the family, any card may increase its length. Subsequent cards must be the same number as the previous card or higher than it.

A family can be made safe by playing a Family Card. The value of your family is thus safe-guarded. Next turn, you can start a new family. When the Draw Pile is exhausted, the round ends and scores are recorded for the value of cards in your protected families and in your current family at the round end.

Oma (Grandma) cards can make another player start a family all over again. Joker cards can represent any card.

The first to 60 points, wins.

Contents
11 Opa-Solo-Cards
Opa-Punktekarten (mit den Wertigkeiten 1 - 3)
11 Oma-Stichkarten
11 Familien-Karten
2 Jokers

125774.name: Líder (Número 12 – Agosto 1989)
125774.description:
Spanish Líder Magazine Issue #12
Book Summary:

SUMARIO:

Communikado
El Estado de la Afición
IV Jornadas de Juego
Ranking, por Montse Montané y Juan Parés Mares
Las llamadas..., por Jordi Zamarreño.
Orco Francis
Silencio... Se Juega!
Russian Campaing por correo, por Armando Antoñano.
Castillo de los Templarios, por Javier Gómez.
Hongos de Yuggoth, por Jordi Zamarreño.
La Isla de los Grifos, por José López Jara.
Plomo en las Mesas
La batalla de S,Marcial, por Jesús María Cortés Meoqui.
Dossier: Historia y organización de las Fuerzas Armadas Japonesas, por Andrés Asenjo.
Dossier: Formación de caja, por Xavier Dropez.
Europa - España, por Juan Parés Mares.
La voz del master
El Señor de los Anillos, por José López Jara.
Cthulhu Airlines, por José López Jara.
Concurso de creación de módulos JESYR 89
Armas Flexibles en Rune Quest, por Gabriel Pérez Huertas.
Hoja de Personaje de Cthulhu
Modulo Cthulhu
La bestia no debe nacer, por Ricard Ibáñez.
Modulo Rune Quest
Broo, por Joaquín Ruíz Castro.

125775.name: Tea & Biscuits
125775.description:
How nice it can be to have the simple things in life, like a cup of tea and a nice biscuit to go with it. In this game you will try to make the best combinations of tea and biscuits in order to score the most points.

Tea & Biscuits is a game for 2-5 players where players will create sequences of cards to score points before the card piles run out and trying to complete the objectives available for bonus points. The player who scores the most points is the winner.

125776.name: Líder (Número 13 – Octubre 1989)
125776.description:
Spanish Líder Magazine Issue #13
Book Summary:

SUMARIO:

Communikado
El Estado de la Afición
IV Jornadas de Juego
Concurso de módulos JESYR 89
Ranking, por Montse Montané y Juan Parés Mares
Las llamadas..., por Jordi Zamarreño.
Orco Francis
Silencio... Se Juega!
Third Reich, por Javier Gómez.
War & Peace, por Javier Gómez de Sturmtruppen.
El correo del Zar
D-Day, por Armando Antoñano.
Plomo en las Mesas
La batalla de Matarón, por Jesús María Cortés Meoqui.
Dossier: El Señor de los Anillos, por José López Jara.
Modulo del Señor de los Anillos
El Silmadûr, por Tomás Olarte y Pedro Olarte.
Modulo de La Llamada de Cthulhu

186539.name: Quest: Zeit der Helden – Umhang der ewigen Wache

125782.description:
Were your heroes able to fight off the attack of the Orcs? Then this adventure book offers you offer two brand new challenges. In addition, you get the new quest item "Cloak of the Eternal Guard."

- The Golden Skull: A boat trip takes you to the northern islands. Find out how the Pale King could wake up - and where the treasure map of the heroes comes from.

- The Crypt: The Pale King is defeated, and a moment later villains are on the hunt for his power over the dead. Can you catch up?

To play the adventures the game Quest: A Time of Heroes is needed.
125782.name: Quest: Zeit der Helden – Abenteuerband 1

125783.name: Durch das bunte Märchenland
125783.description:
Simple children's card game, based on characters from Grimms' fairytales.

The cards are dealt out evenly. The first player asks any other playerr for a card that is the pair of one of his cards. If a pair is found, the enquirer is encouraged to read the rhyming text on both cards. This will make the game more interesting, especially for the younger players. He or she then places the pair in front of them. Play proceeds clockwise. When all the cards are used up, the player with the most pairs, wins.

125785.name: The Sixth Annual Neo-Anarchists Guide to Everything Else

rpgissue.14487: The Annual Neo-Anarchists Guide to Everything Else

125785.description:
From the front page:

In This Issue:
Tom Dowd Fiction
Lots of Magic
Germany Sourcebook Gear
New Drones and Related Cyber
The Rolodex and Meat Market
News From FASA
...and more!!

125786.name: The Fourth Annual Neo-Anarchists Guide to Everything Else

rpgissue.14487: The Annual Neo-Anarchists Guide to Everything Else

125786.description:
From the contents list:

Bulletin Board, Pueblo Crosswalk of the West, The Meat Market, Skillwires, The Ice Box, Forging Time/Date Stamps, Sleepwalkers, The Black Market, The Beastmaster, Multi-Tasking, On-Line Grimoire, Master Spell List Addenda, The Spirit Guide, Index

125787.name: Shikishima Heroes
125787.description:
Designer description

Shikishima Heroes is micro RPG, that allows you to play pulp-style Naval Superheroes.

The battleship Shikishima was commissioned in 1900, but disappeared on its its first sortie with no explanation. A year later the ship reappeared. None of the crew had a memory of the lost year, nor did they know where fully an eighth of the crew had gone! Men from every section were simply missing, with no signs of foul play.

Even as the ship steamed back to port the crew realised they had been changed. Every member found themselves to have gained strange super powers.

When the Japanese people realised how changed the crew were, their joy was turned to fear, and now the Shikishima and its crew are kept at sea.

When anything unusual appears, be it super villains, giant monsters or aliens the Emperor dispatches the Shikishima.

Shikishima Heroes is a micro RPG, it is designed to printed on a single sheet of paper and folded into a little booklet using the "PocketMod" system

125788.description:
Basketball Team Card Game

Enjoy the dynamic, the humor and the assistance and betrayal of a game played by brave young men.
